comments.text:
most of these seem to be OS level problems, but we should set up a directory where people can run a variety of test to see of they see the same crashes that other see.

here are crash urls that mention webgl, os version, signatures and comments from the first week in march

   4 http://www.peter-strohm.de/webgl/index.php Windows NT nvwgf2um.dll@0x5159f \N
   2 https://cvs.khronos.org/svn/repos/registry/trunk/public/webgl/sdk/tests/conformance/more/functions/drawElements.html Windows NT nvd3dum.dll@0x4a79b5 \N
   2 https://cvs.khronos.org/svn/repos/registry/trunk/public/webgl/sdk/tests/conformance/get-active-test.html Windows NT _invalid_parameter_noinfo \N
   2 http://www.nihilogic.dk/labs/worlds_of_webgl/ Windows NT atioglxx.dll@0x4e4aa0 \N
   2 http://www.google.com.hk/search?q=webgl&ie=utf-8&oe=utf-8&aq=t&rls=org.mozilla:hy-AM:official&client=firefox-a Linux libnpo3dautoplugin.so@0x1e4019 \N
   2 http://o3d.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/samples_webgl/o3d-webgl-samples/hellocube.html Linux libGL.so.1.2@0x6d29c \N
   2 http://mikedev.web.officelive.com/webgl/testWebGL.htm Mac OS X GeForceGLDriver@0x12910 \N
   2 file:///home/gonzo/src/webgl-earth/webglearth-read-only/weapp/index.html Linux linux-gate.so@0x416 \N
   1 https://cvs.khronos.org/svn/repos/registry/trunk/public/webgl/sdk/tests/webgl-conformance-tests.html Linux libX11.so.6.3.0@0x32274 \N
   1 https://cvs.khronos.org/svn/repos/registry/trunk/public/webgl/sdk/tests/webgl-conformance-tests.html Linux libX11.so.6.3.0@0x30c0b \N
   1 https://cvs.khronos.org/svn/repos/registry/trunk/public/webgl/sdk/tests/conformance/more/functions/drawElements.html Windows NT nvd3dum.dll@0x4b81e5 Running WebGL test
   1 https://cvs.khronos.org/svn/repos/registry/trunk/public/webgl/sdk/tests/conformance/more/functions/drawElements.html Windows NT nvd3dum.dll@0x4b81e5 Draw Elements
   1 https://cvs.khronos.org/svn/repos/registry/trunk/public/webgl/sdk/tests/conformance/gl-get-active-uniform.html Linux libGL.so.1.2@0x3f7d0 \N
   1 https://cvs.khronos.org/svn/repos/registry/trunk/public/webgl/sdk/tests/conformance/context-type-test.html Windows NT ig4icd64.dll@0x42720 \N
   1 https://cvs.khronos.org/svn/repos/registry/trunk/public/webgl/sdk/tests/conformance/buffer-preserve-test.html Windows NT ig4icd64.dll@0x42720 \N
   1 https://cvs.khronos.org/svn/repos/registry/trunk/public/webgl/sdk/tests/conformance/buffer-bind-test.html Windows NT mozalloc_abort(char const* const) | mozalloc_handle_oom() | nsTArray_base<nsTArrayDefaultAllocator>::EnsureCapacity(unsigned int, unsigned int) | nsTArray_base<nsTArrayDefaultAllocator>::InsertSlotsAt(unsigned int, unsigned int, unsigned int) | nsTArra... \N
   1 https://cvs.khronos.org/svn/repos/registry/trunk/public/webgl/sdk/demos/google/san-angeles/index.html Windows NT nvoglnt.dll@0x19f437 \N
   1 https://cvs.khronos.org/svn/repos/registry/trunk/public/webgl/sdk/demos/google/san-angeles/index.html Windows NT ntdll.dll@0x32239 \N
   1 https://cvs.khronos.org/svn/repos/registry/trunk/public/webgl/sdk/demos/google/particles/index.html Windows NT gl::VertexDataConverter<float, gl::WidenRule<int, 4>, gl::ConversionRule<int, 0, int>, gl::DefaultVertexValues<float, int> >::convertArray(float const*, unsigned int, unsigned int, float*) \N
   1 http://www.webglearth.com/#z=3.00;ll=0.00000,0.00000 Windows NT js::Shape::trace(JSTracer*) \N
   1 http://www.peter-strohm.de/webgl/webgltutorial0.php Windows NT nvwgf2um.dll@0x160a8f \N
   1 http://www.peter-strohm.de/webgl/index.php Windows NT nvwgf2um.dll@0x160a8f \N
   1 http://www.nmr.mgh.harvard.edu/~rudolph/webgl/brain_viewer/brain_viewer.html Linux r600_dri.so@0x34b68 \N
   1 http://www.khronos.org/webgl/wiki/Demo_Repository Windows NT nvwgf2um.dll@0x5159f \N
   1 http://www.ibiblio.org/e-notes/webgl/models/fire.html Linux libc-2.11.2.so@0x73b08 \N
   1 http://www.ibiblio.org/e-notes/webgl/models/NaClb5.html Mac OS X GeForceGLDriver@0xc9969 \N
   1 http://www.ibiblio.org/e-notes/webgl/deflate/pansy.html Windows NT gl::Blit::initGeometry() \N
   1 http://www.geeks3d.com/hacklab/20100319/webgl-demo-bluffante/ Windows NT atioglxx.dll@0x4e4aa0 \N
   1 http://www.doesmybrowsersupportwebgl.com/ Windows NT nvwgf2um.dll@0x147aa7 \N
   1 http://www.doesmybrowsersupportwebgl.com/ Windows NT ntdll.dll@0x38da9 \N
   1 http://www.ditii.com/2010/09/14/google-chrome-webgl-demo-gallery-live-now/ \N \N \N
   1 http://webglsamples.googlecode.com/hg/field/field.html Windows NT nvoglnt.dll@0x234e48 \N
   1 http://webglsamples.googlecode.com/hg/aquarium/aquarium.html Windows NT nvoglnt.dll@0x278df \N
   1 http://webglsamples.googlecode.com/hg/aquarium/aquarium.html Windows NT nvoglnt.dll@0x2358c8 \N
   1 http://webglsamples.googlecode.com/hg/aquarium/aquarium.html Windows NT nvoglnt.dll@0x234e48 \N
   1 http://webglsamples.googlecode.com/hg/aquarium/aquarium.html Windows NT ntdll.dll@0x82865 \N
   1 http://webglsamples.googlecode.com/hg/aquarium/aquarium.html Windows NT ntdll.dll@0x38da9 \N
   1 http://playpcesor.blogspot.com/2011/03/webgl-10-3die-9.html Windows NT nsThread::ProcessNextEvent(int, int*) \N
   1 http://playpcesor.blogspot.com/2011/03/webgl-10-3die-9.html Windows NT memmove | nsCacheMetaData::SetElement(char const*, char const*) \N
   1 http://people.mozilla.com/~sicking/webgl/ray.html Windows NT ntdll.dll@0x32239 \N
   1 http://people.mozilla.com/~sicking/webgl/ray.html Windows NT gl::Context::readPixels(int, int, int, int, unsigned int, unsigned int, void*) \N
   1 http://mrdoob.github.com/three.js/examples/webgl_materials_shaders.html Mac OS X libGLProgrammability.dylib@0x26c675 WebGL Site crashed FF4
   1 http://learningwebgl.com/lessons/lesson06/index.html Windows NT gl::VertexDataManager::setupAttributes(gl::TranslatedAttribute const*) \N
   1 http://learningwebgl.com/lessons/lesson01/index.html Windows NT nvwgf2um.dll@0x160a8f \N
   1 http://blog.nihilogic.dk/2010/03/worlds-of-webgl.html Linux libOSMesa.so.6.5.3@0x187111 \N
   1 http://assaultwars.com/javascriptgame/webgl/webglvoxels.html Windows NT d3dcompiler_42.dll@0xf21a8 Testing effect of already-reported bug
   1 http://alteredqualia.com/three/examples/webgl_postprocessing_dof.html Windows NT xul.dll@0x4bac9c \N
comments.creator: chofmann@gmail.com
